## Data Engineering

Short line: Turn messy sources into dependable, model‑ready data.

Overview: We implement ingestion, transformation and storage that make data trustworthy and accessible for analytics and ML.

Expandable services:
- Data harvesting & ingestion — Stable connectors, scheduling and change capture.
- ETL/ELT pipeline design & orchestration — Maintainable transformations with lineage and observability.
- Database storage & schema design — Scalable schemas and indexing tuned for analytics.
- Data management & governance — Cataloguing, access controls and documentation to reduce technical debt.
- Model‑ready datasets & deployment environments — Versioned data and reproducible compute for analytics teams.

Benefits: Reduced technical debt, improved discoverability and faster model development cycles.
